blogPost.excerpt:
SUBSCRIBE TO ANTLAB: http://www.youtube.com/antlab
True Facts T-shirts: https://ze-true-store.myshopify.com/
CREDITS:

Thank you to Dr. Adrian Smith! Most of the footage in this video is from Dr. Smith's YouTube channel. He has all sorts of wonderful content there, and does a much more thorough job in explaining all of the science behind his work.

Thank you to Dr. Alex Wild! Please look at Dr. Wild's incredible collection of photos: http://www.alexanderwild.com

Thank you Dr. Fred Larabee,  Josh C. Gibson and DR. Eduardo Fox for their amazing footage.

Research:

Booher DB, Gibson JC, Liu C, Longino JT, Fisher BL, Janda M, et al. 2021. Functional innovation promotes diversification of form in the evolution of an ultrafast trap-jaw mechanism in ants. PLoS Biol 19(3): e3001031. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pbio.3001031

FOX, E.G.P., SMITH, A.A., GIBSON, J.C. & SOLIS, D.R. 2017: Larvae of trap-jaw ants, Odontomachus LATREILLE, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae): morphology and biological notes. – Myrmecological News 25: 17-28.

Larabee, Fredrick J. and Suarez, Andrew V. 2014. "The evolution and functional morphology of trap-jaw ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)." Myrmecological News 20: 25– 36.

Larabee FJ, Suarez AV 2015. Mandible-Powered Escape Jumps in Trap-Jaw Ants Increase Survival Rates during Predator-Prey Encounters. PLOS ONE 10(5): e0124871.

Larabee, Fredrick J., Smith, Adrian A. and Suarez, Andrew V. 2018. Snap-jaw morphology is specialized for high-speed power amplification in the Dracula ant, Mystrium camillae R. Soc. Open Sci 5: 181447

Smith, A.A. 2019.  Prey specialization and chemical mimicry between Formica archboldi and Odontomachus ants. Insect. Soc. 66, 211–222.
blogPost.body:
SUBSCRIBE TO ANTLAB: http://www.youtube.com/antlab
True Facts T-shirts: https://ze-true-store.myshopify.com/
CREDITS:

Thank you to Dr. Adrian Smith! Most of the footage in this video is from Dr. Smith's YouTube channel. He has all sorts of wonderful content there, and does a much more thorough job in explaining all of the science behind his work.

Thank you to Dr. Alex Wild! Please look at Dr. Wild's incredible collection of photos: http://www.alexanderwild.com

Thank you Dr. Fred Larabee,  Josh C. Gibson and DR. Eduardo Fox for their amazing footage.

Research:

Booher DB, Gibson JC, Liu C, Longino JT, Fisher BL, Janda M, et al. 2021. Functional innovation promotes diversification of form in the evolution of an ultrafast trap-jaw mechanism in ants. PLoS Biol 19(3): e3001031. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pbio.3001031

FOX, E.G.P., SMITH, A.A., GIBSON, J.C. & SOLIS, D.R. 2017: Larvae of trap-jaw ants, Odontomachus LATREILLE, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae): morphology and biological notes. – Myrmecological News 25: 17-28.

Larabee, Fredrick J. and Suarez, Andrew V. 2014. "The evolution and functional morphology of trap-jaw ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)." Myrmecological News 20: 25– 36.

Larabee FJ, Suarez AV 2015. Mandible-Powered Escape Jumps in Trap-Jaw Ants Increase Survival Rates during Predator-Prey Encounters. PLOS ONE 10(5): e0124871.

Larabee, Fredrick J., Smith, Adrian A. and Suarez, Andrew V. 2018. Snap-jaw morphology is specialized for high-speed power amplification in the Dracula ant, Mystrium camillae R. Soc. Open Sci 5: 181447

Smith, A.A. 2019.  Prey specialization and chemical mimicry between Formica archboldi and Odontomachus ants. Insect. Soc. 66, 211–222.
blogPost.title: True Facts: Trap Jaw Ants
blogPost.author: zefrank1

localize.title: True Facts: トラップジョーアリ
localize.description:
antlabへの登録: http://www.youtube.com/antlab
True Facts T-shirts: https://ze-true-store.myshopify.com/
CREDITS

Adrian Smith博士に感謝します。このビデオの映像のほとんどは、スミス博士のYouTubeチャンネルからのものです。このビデオのほとんどの映像は、スミス博士のYouTubeチャンネルからのものです。彼はそこに様々な素晴らしいコンテンツを持っており、自分の仕事の背後にある科学のすべてをより詳細に説明しています。

アレックス・ワイルド博士、ありがとうございました。ワイルド博士の素晴らしい写真集をご覧ください。http://www.alexanderwild.com

Fred Larabee博士、Josh C. Gibson氏に感謝します。
そしてDR. Eduardo Foxさん、素晴らしい映像をありがとうございました。

研究内容

Booher DB, Gibson JC, Liu C, Longino JT, Fisher BL, Janda M, et al.2021. 機能的革新は、アリの超高速トラップ・ジョー機構の進化における形態の多様化を促進する。PLoS Biol 19(3): e3001031. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pbio.3001031

fox, e.g.p., smith, a.a., gibson, j.c. & solis, d.r. 2017: trap-jaw ants, Odontomachus LATREILLE, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) のLarvae: morphology and biological notes. - Myrmecological News 25: 17-28.

Larabee, Fredrick J. and Suarez, Andrew V. 2014. "The evolution and functional morphology of trap-jaw ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae).". Myrmecological News 20: 25- 36.

Larabee FJ, Suarez AV 2015. Trap-Jaw antsにおけるMandible-Powered Escape Jumps Increase Survival Rates during Predator-Prey Encounters. PLOS ONE 10(5): e0124871.

Larabee, Fredrick J., Smith, Adrian A. and Suarez, Andrew V. 2018. Snap-Jaw形態は、ドラキュラアント（Mystrium camillae R. Soc. Open Sci 5: 181447）の高速電力増幅に特化している。

スミス、A.A. 2019.  Formica archboldiとOdontomachus antsの間の獲物の特殊化と化学的擬態。Insect. Soc. 66, 211-222.

localize.title: 真实的事实。陷阱颚蚂蚁
localize.description:
订阅ANTLAB：http://www.youtube.com/antlab
True Facts T-shirts: https://ze-true-store.myshopify.com/
荣誉。

感谢Adrian Smith博士！这段视频中的大部分镜头来自史密斯博士的YouTube频道。他在那里有各种精彩的内容，并且在解释他工作背后的所有科学方面做了更彻底的工作。

感谢亚历克斯-怀尔德博士! 请看Wild博士令人难以置信的照片集：http://www.alexanderwild.com。

感谢弗雷德-拉拉比博士，乔希-C-吉布森。
和DR. 爱德华多-福克斯的惊人镜头。爱德华多-福克斯的惊人镜头。

的研究。

Booher DB, Gibson JC, Liu C, Longino JT, Fisher BL, Janda M, et al. 2021. Functional innovation promotes diversification of form in the evolution of an ultrafast trap-jaw mechanism in ants. PLoS Biol 19(3): e3001031. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pbio.3001031。

FOX, E.G.P., SMITH, A.A., GIBSON, J.C. & SOLIS, D.R. 2017: Larvae of trap-jaw ants, Odontomachus LATREILLE, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae): morphology and biological notes. - Myrmecological News 25: 17-28.

Larabee, Fredrick J. and Suarez, Andrew V. 2014. "The evolution and functional morphology of trap-jaw ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)." Myrmecological News 20：25- 36.

Larabee FJ，Suarez AV 2015. Mandible-Powered Escape Jumps in Trap-Jaw Ants Increase Survival Rates during Predator-Prey Encounters. PLOS ONE 10（5）：e0124871.

Larabee, Fredrick J., Smith, Adrian A. and Suarez, Andrew V. 2018. Snap-jaw morphology is specialized for high-speed power amplification in the Dracula ant, Mystrium camillae R. Soc. Open Sci 5: 181447.

Smith, A.A. 2019.  Formica archboldi和Odontomachus蚂蚁之间的猎物特化和化学模仿。Insect.Soc. 66, 211-222. Soc. 66, 211-222.

localize.title: 真實的事實。陷阱顎螞蟻
localize.description:
訂閱ANTLAB：http://www.youtube.com/antlab
True Facts T-shirts: https://ze-true-store.myshopify.com/
榮譽。

感謝Adrian Smith博士！這段視頻中的大部分鏡頭來自史密斯博士的YouTube頻道。他在那裏有各種精彩的內容，並且在解釋他工作背後的所有科學方面做了更徹底的工作。

感謝亞歷克斯-懷爾德博士! 請看Wild博士令人難以置信的照片集：http://www.alexanderwild.com。

感謝弗雷德-拉拉比博士，喬希-C-吉布森。
和DR. 愛德華多-福克斯的驚人鏡頭。愛德華多-福克斯的驚人鏡頭。

的研究。

Booher DB, Gibson JC, Liu C, Longino JT, Fisher BL, Janda M, et al. 2021. Functional innovation promotes diversification of form in the evolution of an ultrafast trap-jaw mechanism in ants. PLoS Biol 19(3): e3001031. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pbio.3001031。

FOX, E.G.P., SMITH, A.A., GIBSON, J.C. & SOLIS, D.R. 2017: Larvae of trap-jaw ants, Odontomachus LATREILLE, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae): morphology and biological notes. - Myrmecological News 25: 17-28.

Larabee, Fredrick J. and Suarez, Andrew V. 2014. "The evolution and functional morphology of trap-jaw ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)." Myrmecological News 20：25- 36.

Larabee FJ，Suarez AV 2015. Mandible-Powered Escape Jumps in Trap-Jaw Ants Increase Survival Rates during Predator-Prey Encounters. PLOS ONE 10（5）：e0124871.

Larabee, Fredrick J., Smith, Adrian A. and Suarez, Andrew V. 2018. Snap-jaw morphology is specialized for high-speed power amplification in the Dracula ant, Mystrium camillae R. Soc. Open Sci 5: 181447.

Smith, A.A. 2019.  Formica archboldi和Odontomachus螞蟻之間的獵物特化和化學模仿。Insect.Soc. 66, 211-222. Soc. 66, 211-222.
